subject: Re: How to start
author: psi_research
full_text:
I don't have Ben as my contact but for some reason it seems that what
ever the name you identify and start working with is what stays with you. 

-- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Carol B." <cbreck@...> wrote:
>
> OK,
> I've read that there are technicians assigned to us...I asked if I had
> been assigned one as of yet, and got a very clear "Yes"...I asked
the name
> of my technician, and got a very clear, "Ben".  I have not started to
> record these yet, but my question to the group is this...Does anyone
else
> have a Ben as a tech?
> 
> Carol B.
>
